title: Does anyone else FPS drop when they open the store in game?!
body:
Hi guys, played a few games last night and was noticing that whenever id open the store to buy items my FPS would drop from 200ish down to 7. Wondering if anyone else is experiencing thats problem as it seems to much of a coincidense for the frames to drop every time I open the shop.
thanks!

replies.body: That...is an odd one. If a client repair doesn't do the trick I'd recommend submitting a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
